prompt:
A 68-year-old male patient visited the urology clinic in another hospital because of acute urinary retention. His medical history included hypertension without any specific family history.
Questions: (1) Has the patient been diagnosed with small cell carcinoma of the prostate? (2) If so, has the diagnosis been histologically confirmed?

### Response:
completion: (1) Answer: Yes. Justification: "The pathologic results showed small cell carcinoma invading the capsule of the prostate". (2) Answer: Yes. Justification: "The pathologic results showed small cell carcinoma invading the capsule of the prostate"; "in July 2009, the patient underwent robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy".
